head: 85105c567933960c4993b50643810526c7f05eee
title: Layering: Add GetRequestedModules() to Module Record

revs.author: Daniel Clark
revs.subject: Move Cyclic Module Record's [[RequestedModules]] list down to Source Text Module Record.  The base type will now always use GetRequestedModules() to obtain this list.

revs.author: Daniel Clark
revs.subject: In GetRequestedModules, allow the HostResolveImportedModule call to return an abrupt completion.

revs.author: Daniel Clark
revs.subject: Remove double-space, update list iteration wording, add back emu-closing tag that got clipped out

revs.author: Daniel Clark
revs.subject: Add GetRequestedModules() abstract method to Cyclic Module Record, with implementation for Source Text Module Record.  Refactor InnerModuleInstantiation/InnerModuleEvaluation to use this instead of [[RequestedModules]] directly.
